------------ Game Setup ------------
Supply cards: Poor House, Masquerade, Smugglers, Warehouse, Bureaucrat, Marauder, Governor, Laboratory, Mint, Witch, Copper, Silver, Gold, Estate, Duchy, Province, Curse, Ruins

dscarpac - starting cards: Estate, Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper, Copper
GastonNcy - shuffles deck

GastonNcy - draws Estate, Estate, Copper, Copper, Copper
